title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1094/2004 of 10 June 2004 amending the rates of the refunds applicable to certain milk products exported in the form of goods not covered by Annex I to the Treaty
header:
11.6.2004 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 209/12
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1094/2004
of 10 June 2004
amending the rates of the refunds applicable to certain milk products exported in the form of goods not covered by Annex I to the Treaty
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EC) No 1255/1999 of 17 May 1999 on the common organisation of the markets in the milk and milk products sector (1), and in particular Article 31(3) thereof,
Whereas:
(1) The rates of the refunds applicable from 28 May 2004 to the products listed in the Annex, exported in the form of goods not covered by Annex I to the Treaty, were fixed by Commission Regulation (EC) No 1030/2004 (2).
(2) It follows from applying the rules and criteria contained in Regulation (EC) No 1030/2004 to the information at present available to the Commission that the export refunds at present applicable should be altered as shown in the Annex hereto,
main_body: The rates of refund fixed by Regulation (EC) No 1030/2004 are hereby altered as shown in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 11 June 2004.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 June 2004.
For the Commission
Erkki LIIKANEN
Member of the Commission
(1)  OJ L 160, 26.6.1999, p. 48. Regulation as last amended by Regulation (EC) No 1787/2003 (OJ L 270, 21.10.2003, p. 121).
(2)  OJ L 190, 28.5.2004, p. 9.
ANNEX
Rates of the refunds applicable from 11 June 2004 to certain milk products exported in the form of goods not covered by Annex I to the Treaty
(EUR/100 kg)
CN code Description Rate of refund
In case of advance fixing of refunds Other
ex 0402 10 19 Powdered milk, in granules or other solid forms, not containing added sugar or other sweetening matter, with a fat content not exceeding 1,5 % by weight (PG 2):
(a) on exportation of goods of CN code 3501
(b) on exportation of other goods
ex 0402 21 19 Powdered milk, in granules or other solid forms, not containing added sugar or other sweetening matter, with a fat content of 26 % by weight (PG 3):
(a) where goods incorporating, in the form of products assimilated to PG 3, reduced-price butter or cream obtained pursuant to Regulation (EC) No 2571/97 are exported
(b) on exportation of other goods
ex 0405 10 Butter, with a fat content by weight of 82 % (PG 6):
(a) where goods containing reduced-price butter or cream which have been manufactured in accordance with the conditions provided for in Regulation (EC) No 2571/97 are exported
(b) on exportation of goods of CN code 2106 90 98 containing 40 % or more by weight of milk fat
(c) on exportation of other goods
